resources.string: The Human body has as many bones as you can grow (upwards of 1000 if you\'re lucky).
The blood of a mammal always starts out green before it comes into contact with oxygen.
There is a part of the neurons in your brain called a synapse.
Stomach acid is chemically composed of the same compounds in deodorant.
When the fluid in the human eye does not drain properly, creating extra pressure, a condition known as Ocular Hypertension manifests.
